snippet.title: Industrial Fear | Release Trailer (Free itch.io Game)
snippet.description:
Play it Here: https://thegonzadev.itch.io/industrial-fear
(Its completely free to play! Just click the "No thanks, just take me to the downloads" button)

Industrial Fear is a short, atmospheric psychological horror where you play as a factory worker finishing his shift. There are multiple endings to complete and collectables but it can be fully completed in 15 minutes.

Plot:
You are a factory worker called Orpheus in a late night shift, your boss tells you that if you finish with today's work you can go home early because of power issues. Would you be able to leave alive?

Content:
- 5 to 15 minutes of gameplay.
- 4 different endings  (2 secret ones).
- 4 Hidden collectables.
- Subtitles for interactions

Music used: Salvation - GWriterStudio  ( https://assetstore.unity.com/publishers/27610 )


//Ignore this//
